Master Selsia:
Kill Crimson Lady and take the (Giants' Research Documents).
Secrets of our race should not fall into a wrong hands. Crimson Lady guarded by Orcs: Timak Orcs and Timak Orc Archers in Timak Outpost.
Kill Timak Orcs and Timak Orc Archers and you will find her.
This is not an easy task.
Good luck!
